scripts.prepare:subgraph: rm -f subgraph.yaml && cp ./manifests/$NETWORK.subgraph.yaml subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && yarn codegen && rm -rf build && yarn build
scripts.deploy:polygon:dev: yarn prepare:polygon:dev && SLUG=dhedge/dhedge-v2-polygon-dev env-cmd yarn deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && SLUG=dhedge/dhedge-v2-polygon env-cmd yarn deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:optimism: yarn prepare:optimism && SLUG=dhedge/dhedge-v2-optimism env-cmd yarn deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && SLUG=dhedge/dhedge-v2-arbitrum env-cmd yarn deploy:hosted
